title: Imagine there was a workshop at PAX for MEN ONLY.....
body:
Do you have any idea what kind of outrage that would have caused? But it's OK to do the EXACT SAME THING, to the other 50%?

I mean seriously, what are they thinking? 
Bringing back segregation, to combat gender inequality? 
That's gotta be the MOST idiotic thing they have ever come up with, WTF Riot?!? And then publicly defending it after you already saw the damage it had done? 

The people at Tencent are probably facepalming while at the same time browsing LinkedIN for better qualified people in management... Or at least I would hope that's what they're doing.
